View Text: Former Encana chief executive Gwyn Morgan is quietly backing a network of think tanks, astroturf groups and rightwing media disputing the climate crisis.

View Title: Atlas Network Connections, and Other Donations
View Text: Morgan's foundation has donated to various Atlas groups...

View Title: Atlas Network Connections, and Other Donations
View Text: Morgan has been listed on the board of directors at the Fraser Institute, an Atlas Network member organization, as recently as 2023...

View Title: Atlas Network Connections, and Other Donations
View Text: Charles Koch donated to Fraser and other Atlas groups...

View Title: Atlas Network Connections, and Other Donations
Atlas Network Connections, and Other Donations
View Text: The Canada Strong and Free Network, an organization funding regional Canadian campaign front groups, has also received donations from Morgan...

View Title: Atlas Network Connections, and Other Donations

View Text: Morgan has also been involved in the Canadian media space, contributing to the National Post/Financial Post, and funding Juno News (formerly True North).
Morgan backed Pierre Poilievre in the recent election.
Fraser Institute has received regular donations from Imperial Oil, which has also donated to fellow Atlas partner Macdonald Laurier Institute...
Imperial is a key member of Pathways Alliance...
Pathways member Cenovus has given to the Indigenous Resource Network and Canada Action...
Canadian Natural Resources, a Pathways member, gave to Indian Resource Council...
